content: the latest pattern from our gnome collection is the june bride > the free pattern is available on our blog here 1 this crochet bride gnome pattern will make a unique wedding gift for you or your loved one if you want to add a touch of magic to your wedding decoration the bride wedding gnome is the perfect choice you can pair the bride gnome with her soulmate- the groom gnome you can find the pattern here the pattern pdf contains 8 pages with clear instructions and photo tutorials to guide you through skill level- easy/ beginner crochet terms- us crochet terms 1 https //www passionatecrafter com/how-to-crochet-your-own-wedding-gnome-free-pattern/
